Service Details: Provides public services for property taxes, building permits, development applications and rental properties
How to Apply: Use the online service request form or locate the contact information necessary to communicate your service requests, compliments or concerns to the appropriate City Department
Meetings: Regular City Council meetings are held in Council Chambers at City Hall, 1435 Water Street, every Monday afternoon (except holidays) at 1:30pm
Address & Map: City Hall1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Hall is located off Queensway
